Description:
Model

Part Number: SNV3S/1000G
Device Type: Internal Solid State Drive (SSD)
Used For: Consumer


Details
Form Factor: M.2 2280
Capacity: 1TB
Interface: PCIe 4.0 x4 NVMe
Protocol: NVMe


Performance
Max Sequential Read: Up to 6000 MBps
Max Sequential Write: Up to 4000 MBps
MTBF: 2,000,000 hours


Features
Features: Kingston’s NV3 PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD is a next-gen storage solution powered by a Gen 4x4 NVMe controller, delivering read/write speeds up to 6,000/5,000MB/s*. It offers lower power consumption and reduced heat, optimizing your system's performance without compromising value. The compact, single-sided M.2 2280 (22x80mm) design expands storage up to 4TB**,*****, conserving space for other components. Experience NVMe speeds with NV3.

Available in capacities from 500GB – 4TB to give you all the space you need for applications, documents, photos, videos, games and more.

FEATURES
Gen 4x4 NVMe PCIe performance
Ideal for high speed, low power storage


Environmental
Operating Temperature: 0°C ~ +70°C
Storage Temperature: -40°C ~ +70°C

Weight: 7g
Label: SSD M.2 Kingston NV3 1TB
